text: I loved this place! The atmosphere was great, the food was awesome, and the beer list?... Almost limitless. Really appreciated there being so many cider choices other than apples. My husband and I were only in town for two days and we went to Loda on both. Do yourself a favor and go.

name: Jennifer Fort
text: Drinks was awesome.

name: Michael “Jude” Collins
text: Brilliant little bar and restaurant. Excellent beverage selection and food choices that stand their own ground. The burgers are huge and high quality. The grilled chicken salad was fresh and delicious. The service was fast and friendly and we were greeted by no less than 4 staff members.

name: Randy Stephens
text: Best burger ever!!!

name: Anna Downin
text: Best burger I’ve ever had!

name: Shari
text: Amazing pork schnitzel. Great atmosphere. Wonderful wait staff. Very casual with inside dining at large farmhouse style tables as well as outside service on picnic tables on the sidewalk. WELL stocked bar with hard liquor and of course beer. Right in the heart of downtown Mobile and the restaurants and shops on Dauphin.

name: Rimmy Bullock
text: great food/drinks, great staff, great location.

name: scottyindtw
text: Good food, Great service. Thanks, I'll be back.

name: Katherine Salom
text: We love Loda BierGarten! It was actually where me and my boyfriend met!☺️ We have always been pleased with our food and have had great service. Our personal favorites are the southwest egg rolls, mama’s pretzel bombs, sugar rush burger, the Mac attack and of course the spiked milk shakes! Check out Loda BierGarten if you happen to be nearby!

name: Christopher Quatroche
text: The burgers. My god are they good. If you want a creative burger, cooked perfectly, or you're looking to try a new libation (they have over a hundred different beers) Loda is the place to go. From their Chicken and Waffles burger to one that is sandwiched between two donuts, everything on the menu is a winner.

name: James B.
text: Unique layout to say the least but fun.. great staff and good food.

name: Leland Havel
text: Great food, great beer selection. Both times we have been our server went on break or it was shift change during our meal and we got handed off to another section where we were not served

name: Michael DeGraff
text: Visited this establishment on 10/3/19, I was extremely dissatisfied so I had to post this here. I typically enjoy German food and beer so I went in optimistic.  We were unable to order flights of beers because they were out of clean glasses.  Pretzel bombs were hard and flavorless, with that said I do not recommend the brat dip.  Beer was fine but the service was slow.  The food did not appear as shown in the website.  After 2 beers and an appetizer we decided to leave and find someplace else for dinner.

name: David Glass
text: It's no way anyone can't find something they like on the menu. Friendly staff,good food and cold beer.

name: Rocky Oubre
text: Great beer selection and half of drafts on Sunday!! The burgers are delicious 😋

name: Seyedali Hosseinirad
text: Very busy, no social distance and so on!

name: Lauren Rose
text: I always love this place because of its charm and who doesn't love its central locale?! ...but the stringy lioness haired female who served us our drinks and food at the bar was not only unkempt but a bit terrifying. She was quite literally bouncing all over the place .....from one end to the other shouting...and then this lovely blonde with pigtails perhaps observed our thrown off demeanor and took over assisting us the remainder of the evening..... I mean, we will totally be back but.... yikes 😬🤦🏼‍♀️😳

name: Dave Flynn
text:
I like beer, and they gave me some, and I liked it.

I love you all.

name: Aaron
text: Had the Bienville burger. Delicious. Our server was very sweet and helpful. Nice atmosphere. Fair prices. Would go again in a heart beat if I'm ever in mobile AL.

name: Gerald Carr
text: Fun and unique food, great beer selection, with a friendly and professional staff. Excellent option for an evening in town.

name: Lance Bridges
text: I drove from Waco, Texas ; an 10 and a half hour drive to eat the sugar rush burger and halfway into eating it the donuts were hard and the burger tasted like dishwater with cheese. I tried to push through it and finish it even switching the buns out for waffles but I just couldn’t and when I told the waitress about it she said that since I ate it they couldn’t take it back. Which makes me wonder how was I supposed to know the donuts were stale without eating it? I don’t expect to pay $13 for leftover food. Smh.

name: Brittney Turman
text: One of my favorite places to eat and drink. It's usually pretty busy and the food can take a while, but it's so worth the wait. The menu is unique and the beer selection is fantastic!! The burger with amazing smoked sausage is to die for!

name: Kari Carlson
text: Had the waffle burger with a fried egg... my heart won't forgive me but my stomach loves me.  Yum!  Presentation is awesome.  Place is quaint, warm and inviting. Staff is super friendly.  Menu is diverse.  Drink menu is extensive.

name: nisha2003airforce
text: Waited over an hour for service and the waitress (shelby) forgot our drinks..food was good service not so much..... was told there was a military discount but she couldn't do it by her self

name: Lawrencia Ratcliff
text: Great food great drinks

name: Matt S
text: Good presentation, but not as good as it looked.

name: Taylor Brown
text: THIS PLACE IS AWESOME! Great service, excellent food and drinks. Very nice place and a lot of cool decorations. Definitely a must go to if you are in Mobile!

name: Randy Steinkopf
text: Great atmosphere with great service great food and an amazing variety of draft beer

name: David Weeks
text: 1st off, this is the best place I've ever eaten a hamburger. Me and the wife stopped here in passing and was a VERY  GOOD IDEA. We started out with a pretzel and I had a rogue stout beer. I had the sugar rush burger which is a hamburger between 2 German donuts. It's fantastic. Wife had the dirty bird with mac and cheese and loved it! I would definitely come here again!!

name: Jacob Flowers
text: Great environment and great service!

name: mikesmith1percenter Smith
text:
Always nice but the staff no longer knows what beer they sell. I brought German friends to get German beer and the staff had no idea.

Also they do not have coffee? What restaurant doesn't have coffee?

name: Vicki Kruse
text: Great food with a lively atmosphere on the first day of Mardi Gras. A page full of draft brews to choose from.

name: Anna Downin
text: Best burger I’ve ever had!

name: David Glass
text: It's no way anyone can't find something they like on the menu. Friendly staff,good food and cold beer.

name: Rocky Oubre
text: Great beer selection and half of drafts on Sunday!! The burgers are delicious 😋

name: James B.
text: Unique layout to say the least but fun.. great staff and good food.

name: Dave Flynn
text:
I like beer, and they gave me some, and I liked it.

I love you all.

name: Kari Carlson
text: Had the waffle burger with a fried egg... my heart won't forgive me but my stomach loves me.  Yum!  Presentation is awesome.  Place is quaint, warm and inviting. Staff is super friendly.  Menu is diverse.  Drink menu is extensive.

name: Seyedali Hosseinirad
text: Very busy, no social distance and so on!

name: Matt S
text: Good presentation, but not as good as it looked.

name: Lauren Rose
text: I always love this place because of its charm and who doesn't love its central locale?! ...but the stringy lioness haired female who served us our drinks and food at the bar was not only unkempt but a bit terrifying. She was quite literally bouncing all over the place .....from one end to the other shouting...and then this lovely blonde with pigtails perhaps observed our thrown off demeanor and took over assisting us the remainder of the evening..... I mean, we will totally be back but.... yikes 😬🤦🏼‍♀️😳

name: Aaron
text: Had the Bienville burger. Delicious. Our server was very sweet and helpful. Nice atmosphere. Fair prices. Would go again in a heart beat if I'm ever in mobile AL.

name: Eden Keefe
text: Passing through, but sure glad we stopped in for supper and beer! Attentive service, fun atmosphere (lots of locals), indoor and outdoor seating, casual. Great selection of craft beer and a diverse menu.

name: Raven de Danaan
text: Amazing selection, particularly craft on draft. Warm and cozy environment, cheerful and friendly staff. (If you're curious about a draft, they'll even offer you a sample to help you make up your mind!) Great appetizers too. Highly recommend if you're in the area.

name: Ty,s Tv Adventures
text: Mediocre food, subpar staff, But the Manager Tyler is Awsome y’all go see him❤️❤️❤️❤️🥺💖

name: Leigh Saffold
text: Such friendly staff and the food and drinks were awesome!  Fun and hip vibe. We will be back.

name: Thomas Trott
text: Music was to loud. Could hardly hear what my friends were talking about at same table. Good bier.

name: Curt Crider
text: Good food, quick service, adequate vegetarian patty, large portions, root beer on draft, possibly best root beer in town. For alcohol consumers, there is an EXTENSIVE selection. If you can't find something to drink there, you are not thirsty.

name: Chad Boteler
text: Had a great experience. Food was delicious. My wife and I both had the seared tuna blt, which we both enjoyed. Our son had the waffle burger, which he devoured. We had fries which were very good, and my wife has the German potato salad, which was a little weird. The only negative, what the ventilation system way on the fritz, and the whole place was smokey. We will go back again.

name: Meli Harrison
text: I went here for lunch with co-workers. Service was exceptionally slow. I never got a refill on my drink. The dirty bird chicken sandwich was pretty good-a little spicy, but not too much. I also liked the sidewinder fries. Not sure that it was worth what I paid.

name: esculenttechnology
text: Not too bad. Large selection of beer to choose from. Food is really good, however, if you're looking for a light snack this isn't really the place. Friendly staff.

name: Jeff Sullivan
text: Good variety of beer. Standard tap room food menu.

name: Timothy Nunes
text: One if the few places open even with a tropical storm on the way. Reasonable beer prices if on sale (half off cans on Tuesdays). My burger was one of the most enjoyable I've ever had. Very good.

name: Stephen Formica
text: I was super excited when the West Mobile location opened. Half price drafts on Sunday are awesome. Awesome selection.  The outdoor area is really nice and is dog friendly. It has been crowded every time I have gone. Really good, diverse atmosphere and clientele. It is family friendly, but still a cool place to go hang on a dudes night. The food is pretty good and reasonably priced.

name: Julie Cappellano
text: Excellent burger(s).  Horrible service.  If you can make it thru the rough service the food is very worth it.  The beer options are endless - although out of several on the night we visited - which was disappointing.  Food took forever, came out wrong, then right and the bill was incorrect (which the server asked if I wanted it corrected?  Umm, yes?) But the food burger was great.  The other order was wings. It's a burger place - don't expect great wings at a burger place.

name: Benjamin Kudlacek
text: First time in Mobile.  My best friend and I went to beirgarden on a whim to try it out.  The atmosphere was amazing.  Anna our waitress was amazing.  She took great care of us and made us feel at home.  She has a great sense of humor!  Great time, and we will make sure to.come back several times!  Thank you Anna!

name: Joey Prater
text: Cool craft beer car. Recommended for beer people

name: chris cato
text: Awesome staff and they had the beer I wanted, on my third order.  Would go back again

name: Michelle Angle
text: My gosh you gotta eat HERE! Best Reuben Sandwich & a huge piece of Germany Chocolate Cake! They are so NICE to ya THERE! ❤💗💓😄

name: Dusty Pierce
text: Staff good but they ran out of donuts for the sugar rush burger so ordered boneless wings and they were over done

name: Amber Deane
text:
Always a great place to visit!

Great food and interesting employees.

We eat here every chance we get!

Best onion rings ever!!!!

name: Alex Tomlinson
text: Great beer selection and great food.

name: Michael Schubert
text: Great place to kick it with your buddy outside while your dog sleeps under the table

name: Eric Hansen
text: They seem like they run out of beer a lot. Food is good though.

name: Matt C
text: Great beer selection.  Food is really good too!  Will definitely visit again

name: Daniel Sawin
text: Outstanding! Sample a few beers and find something new you enjoy! The food is great also. I had The Mac Attack Burger with fries and a giant pretzel. I will stop by next time I'm in the area for sure!

name: KD
text: Great selection of food and beers. There's always something fun to try here

name: Samantha Sanchez
text: Our table ordered 2 waffle burgers with the meat medium done and got them back overcooked and dry. In addition to this, you would think that being in the south you would get some real homemade waffles rather than frozen Eggo waffles. The buffalo wings were extremely dry. The Reuben sandwich was mediocre at best. The nachos and fried pickles were ordered as appetizers and no one hardly touched them. Unfortunately, most of the food was left behind. Would never come back.

name: j c
text: Great food and awesome service!

name: Dorin Moon
text: Always love this place. It is a must whenever we are in town. The food is phenomenal amd the beer selection is incredible. You will not be disappointed!

name: Jordan Greiner
text: Love the atmosphere and great ambient music selection - very high energy.

name: Christy Daniels
text: Love this place! They have a well organized selection of beers, ciders, and wines! They offer samples if you're not to sure what you want, I mean there is soooooo much to choose from, I personally hate beer but I chose a cider that was really nice! Staff is amazing and very willing to help and will certainly offer there favorites for you to try!  The food is great as well have tried 3 of the many burgers on there menu and they all were delicious! Very nice place to relax and have a couple of drinks. 10/10 recommend

name: nakia crook
text: I love eating here when I'm downtown. The food and service is always great!!

name: Micki
text: Are usually eat here before taking in a show at the Theater downtown, The food is always good

name: Kim Miller
text: They seem to be very busy. The young lady who helped us was very attentive

name: Soccer Bandit
text: I had the Pork schnitzel and it was amazing. It was crispy and juicy. The sauce was seasoned just right. The German potato salad and cabbage were as authentic as it gets on this side of the pond. Sadly, I wish that they had a bigger German menu besides the schnitzel and bratwurst. It would be nice to have a great German restaurant in mobile.

name: Monet Monet
text: Great food.. nice area.. outside eating setting. Friendly staff

name: Tameca McBride
text: Awesome food awesome service 100 of different beers

name: Jessica Ascott
text: Food was fantastic and our server was great in suggesting drinks to try. I highly suggest the sangria or the BlackBerry cider for non-beer drinkers. The food was well worth the price.

name: Alex Almond
text: The Loda in West Mobile has a much better layout, but they try hard to make it work downtown. Otherwise, pretty pleasant.

name: Matt DeBlaey
text: I really liked the place when it opened. BUT we never got a food order right or cooked correctly here. Today, we gave them another chance.  Two of the burgers were cooked correctly at medium, one was well but still edible. One was flat burnt, the outside of the meat was hard. I know I would have never served that to people at my house. The waitress went to the owner (managers were not there) and he said he will cut a discount but wouldn't fix it. You may get away with screwing tourists all day, but I'm local. I will be spreading this around town. They own the Old Shell growler station too. I used to fill up there. Not coming back. Best Burger in town? Maybe 50% of the time. Who wants that? If I want to gamble I'll go to the boats.

name: Nivia MacDonald
text: We always have a good time when go to LoDa. Great atmosphere and beer selection. If it's crowded share a table!

name: sherry stahr
text: The first time I had dinner here was back in April and it was AMAZING... most recently however I had an appointment in Mobile and have been wanting another sugar rush burger very badly. Our waitress was fantastic but the food was not so good. The donuts used for the burger tasted old and stale. And were hard.  Needless to say I left there disappointed :( BUT I will definitely give them another try the next time I'm in the area

name: Melissa Zattier
text: Excellent food! Best burger ever

name: Mel B
text: Outstanding service, although they didn't have the waffle burger which I really wanted I went with the Sugar Rush and glad the waiter  suggested I try it. And the Angry Orchard Rose received an A+ also. I will definitely be back. Best part they're opened until 2am 😍

name: Reid Harvey
text: Great food but service is very slow. Understaffed for a busy night and felt bad for the waitress. Took 1 hour for us to get a drink and 2 hours for food. Not worth the wait, best to go somewhere else.

name: Kimberly Jones
text: I use to love this place so hard. it's gone downhill.  tonight was the last straw. had a conversation about the nachos,  ordered.  (As appetizer) our beer took forever and outdoor waitress totally forgot to rig in nachos let alone the rest of our order. was ridiculous.  👎👎👎👎 not going back. so many good choices downtown,  dont waste your time here.

name: Ziggy Zane
text: This place is always good. The employees are great and the food is among the best downtown. I've never been disappointed by anything at this place. Unfortunately, I have only been here on my lunch breaks and haven't been able to try the alcohol.

name: Joseph McKinney
text: Wings drinks and etc. Not bad

name: Brian Witt
text: Great food! Cool atmosphere. Lots of drink choices. Many beers on tap.

name: Christian Williams
text: I love this place downtown. I ordered some nachos. My boyfriend ordered a huge burger. When they bring you your food its always fresh. The food is also at a very reasonable price.  And you'll be sure to get full and possibly have leftovers. But not only is the food great but their flavored beer is so delicious. The people there are also very nice.

name: Steven Thomas
text: This place is amazing! Great beer and burgers,  Sugar Rush burger is to die for!

resp.text: So glad you enjoyed it! Come back and see us again!

name: Alex Grady
text:
My God..... The food here is insane and not just for bar food. Calling this bar food would be a out right insult, and their creativity on their plating and style of preparation is out of this world!!!
Definitely stop in, you wont regret it!

name: Mike Dingeldey
text: Amazing number of taps. Just about anything you can imagine.

name: Kevin O'Neill
text: Great selections of beer and good food

name: Sarah Priem
text: This place has great food, over 100 beers on tap, and great service. The french fries are super good and the burger was cooked perfectly. This is one of my favorite restaurants in Mobile. There is limited seating, there are spots at the bar and then there are these big tables that often have only 2 people at them, so although it's a big place, it can be hard to snag a table. It's a great place to watch sports, look for a dog with it's own bar stool.

name: River Lotus
text: Awesome! Chill friendly great vines and epic tap selection

name: Scot Dixon
text: They have a wide selection of international beers, and the appetizers were good. The 3 star rating is because it was muggy and warm inside, and the service was very slow. I'm talking about the service regarding taking our subsequent drink orders and bringing the check. (It was the server herself... Not a kitchen issue.) We waited quite a while for both, and it was a week night with few other customers.

name: Homer Teeter
text: This place serves over 200 on tap beers and the food is great. Located in Historic downtown with a good atmosphere. Two thumbs up.

name: Jami Clark
text: Best bar atmosphere downtown in my opinion! Tons of drink options and the food is good too!

name: Jeffrey Jordan
text: Loda BierGarten is a great restaurant / bar and has a huge drink menu I counted at least 50 beers that they have from local to German to everything in between. The food was amazing as well I highly recommend this place for good atmosphere and it's right downtown Mobile so the location is great.

name: Randall Harris
text: Friendly, funky place to eat with a massive beer and cider list. The pretzel bites were amazing as was the pork schnitzel. Service was top notch. I would definitely return!!

name: Ziggy Zane
text: This place is always good. The employees are great and the food is among the best downtown. I've never been disappointed by anything at this place. Unfortunately, I have only been here on my lunch breaks and haven't been able to try the alcohol.

name: chris cato
text: Awesome staff and they had the beer I wanted, on my third order.  Would go back again

name: Sarah Priem
text: This place has great food, over 100 beers on tap, and great service. The french fries are super good and the burger was cooked perfectly. This is one of my favorite restaurants in Mobile. There is limited seating, there are spots at the bar and then there are these big tables that often have only 2 people at them, so although it's a big place, it can be hard to snag a table. It's a great place to watch sports, look for a dog with it's own bar stool.

name: Reid Harvey
text: Great food but service is very slow. Understaffed for a busy night and felt bad for the waitress. Took 1 hour for us to get a drink and 2 hours for food. Not worth the wait, best to go somewhere else.

name: River Lotus
text: Awesome! Chill friendly great vines and epic tap selection

name: Luna Dreyma
text: Love, love, love, this place. I have tried most of the burgers here and they are all awesome. The fries are good too. I can never finish the burger cause its so big. Very friendly staff. Great to go here with friends. I have never waited super long for a table. Most meals here will run you atleast $10 but the food is well worth it. Great beer selection. Music is sometimes too loud but its what I expect from a place in the center of downtown.

name: Alex Grady
text:
My God..... The food here is insane and not just for bar food. Calling this bar food would be a out right insult, and their creativity on their plating and style of preparation is out of this world!!!
Definitely stop in, you wont regret it!

name: Jami Clark
text: Best bar atmosphere downtown in my opinion! Tons of drink options and the food is good too!

name: Brian Witt
text: Great food! Cool atmosphere. Lots of drink choices. Many beers on tap.

name: Scot Dixon
text: They have a wide selection of international beers, and the appetizers were good. The 3 star rating is because it was muggy and warm inside, and the service was very slow. I'm talking about the service regarding taking our subsequent drink orders and bringing the check. (It was the server herself... Not a kitchen issue.) We waited quite a while for both, and it was a week night with few other customers.

name: Esmeralda Reyes
text: Good food and good atmosphere

name: Kameron Pettaway
text: Great food

name: Dyana Knytych
text:
Indoor or outdoor eating. Service was slow but great crew and amazing burgers.
Can't wait to return to try something new. They also offer an unbelievable amount of craft beers.

name: jacqueline jackson
text: Great appetizers, which can substitute for a full meal. Looks to stay busy even during early evening hours. ok drink specials. Veteran owned with good service.

name: Curtin Taylor
text: Came in with my wife late a few nights a go food was good mostly but the bar tender Nicole  I think was rude. I don’t write reviews but it was bad.

name: Delone Rush
text: Hip bar for a downtown visit to Mobile. Great beer menu and burgers. Enjoyed watching NFL over food and drinks.

name: Ahmed Gad
text: It was okay, price kinda high relative to the quality, I tried the burger it was just fine

name: Talking Cargo Junk Removal
text: I drop a lot of people at this spot.  It must be nice.

name: Matt Bowman
text: Huge choice of ales on draught to choose from. Barman vey helpful in choosing. Samples are offered to see if you like the ale you are going to buy. We had bar snack food which was also good.

name: kraig Kitchens
text: Awesome spot

name: Chris Search
text: U like a BLOODY MARY? Look no further. Best ever! Huuuge beer menu and good food

name: tres b
text: superior selection of beers, almost too many, but they do group them in the menu so it's easy to make a selection. I had a German Pils & the tuna BLT with fries- all excellent. Server was friendly, no complaints. Music (stereo, not live) was a bit loud. Indoor seating a bit tight, outdoor seating available.

name: Chase Trinh
text: Southern hospitality. Can't go wrong if you're visiting. They have a lot of beers and you will be able to find something that you will like!

name: Timothy Hallmark
text: Great spot right in the heart of everything. Pub fare, sandwiches, and more. Try a spiked milkshake while you're here!

name: Karen Weaver
text: Great atmosphere and peoople very friendly. The food was good but nothing really stood out. Not enough space.

name: Denise Ralston
text: Enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere, plan to bring my dog next time.

name: emre b
text: Nice place, nice staff, tasty foods&drinks

name: Sync Master
text: Food was great!! Very cool place to grab a beer and eat

name: Fred Holland
text: Well sat down 15 mins later passed and waited finally game by to get drink order. 45 mins later no drinks... We kindly got up and started to leave then the mgr I believe looked at me and said what's wrong and I told the same thing and all he could say was sorry.. This was on a slow sunday night. Guess they didnt need the business.

name: makeysha roberson
text: The customer service was good, i went to Monday night and they let you build your own burger so that was nice. The menu items looked so so good. Well only thing that bothered me and kind of disappointed me was when they brought my food out the fries weren't hot at all and the burger was kinda cold and it wasn't even busy at that time so I was a little upset. My waiter offer to take it back to get a new one but I said it was okay cuz they had already mixed up our orders and so I was just ready to eat.

name: Dell Brown
text: This place would be a beer drinker's heaven...stick with what you know or take a chance and choose a beer that you've never had!!! This place doesn't disappoint- try it!!!

name: marc Lange
text: We Waited 20 min for a drink order. Then we finally got our drink and food orders in.we waited another 45 min for SANDWICHES....just to top it off our waitress only came by our table 3 times... and she didn't even bring back out change. I had to find her and ask for my change. We will not be returning. If you are looking for a craft beer and good food. Keep on walking.

name: Dakota Reeves
text: Burger was great, but be sure to have a stack of napkins ready. Selection of beers was good, but they happened to be out of my first choice. Overall a great experience, and I hope to return to try more of their German fare.

name: Cynthia Wimberly
text: 102 beers on tap ciders and free tasting

name: Kendall O'Connor
text: Great service, better food (try the bone-in wings!) Friendly & awesome staff... Waiters and waitresses happy to tell you about the town. Beer menu from heaven. Stop thinking about and get here already!!!

name: Sevrin Bancale
text: Loved it! Excellent fish and chips and great beer choices!

name: Max Reyes
text: High variety of overseas beer, excelent food, excelent service. My favorite bar in Mobile Downtown

name: Rebecca Lami
text: Loved this place! It is located at the old pickle fish restaurant in downtown Mobile. This place came highly recommended as we visited Mobile. We went on a Sunday so it was half off draft. Waiter was awesome and kept food and drinks flowing all evening. The atmosphere was calm and enjoyable. We sat outside at the benches and had a great time. Will definitely be back.

name: zack greene
text: I have eaten many burgers in my life!! I have never eaten a burger so delicious as the one I ate here!!!!!!! Wow!!! I wish I could give this place 10 stars!! The service was amazing! This place is a hidden treasure!!!!!!

name: Laura W
text: I stopped here to get a drink with my dog and they are very pet friendly and let us sit outside and I was able to take a break.

name: Lydia Akers
text: The service here has declined over the last few times I've visited. The prices are far too high to not offer impeccable service. The extensive list of beer is the main attraction here, the burgers are tasty if not extravagant . I will consider returning, but not for many months in hopes of either a better trained staff or a turnover and fresh eager faces.

name: Suzanne Coleman
text: Delicious food and beer selection, but be prepared to wait a while.

name: Josey Johnsen
text: Laid back atmosphere, friendly service, food was great.  We had the Reuben and bread pudding.

name: Andrea Dickey
text: Great food, good drink selection. Food just took forever to come out. Everything else was great.

name: Terri Sheridan
text: Food was amazing. Service was even better. The beer was awesome. We will be back!

name: jim howard.
text: Great food, great experience, amazing team behind the bar.., best food I’ve had in Mobile Alabama

name: James Duke
text: Friendly, attentive staff, excellent burgers, and the best beer selection in Mobile. I've never had a bad experience here. Things can run a little slow when they get busy, but that just gives you more time to savor which ever one (or two or three) of their over 100 beers you chose. They do offer flights which is a great way to try several different things, and the wait staff seems to be pretty knowledgeable about the selection.

name: Jeremy Rylee
text: My friend put it as the best burger on the planet. Great food, great fun and at a great price. With over 100 beers on tap!

name: Robert Schultz
text: Service was very rude!! Food quality has gone down in the past six months. Too expensive for the service, drinks and food we got to feed two people...

name: JM
text:
Good food and beer
Slow service

name: Bradley Collins
text: Just lovely. I really enjoyed it.

name: Colten Caudle
text: Good food. It's a nice little bar. Has an upstairs as well.

name: Lorenzo Winters
text: This was a great place to eat and drink but it's a very popular corner on Dauphin Street so it gets crowded quickly, especially when we were there during Mardi Gras. They have a huge selection of libations and very friendly staff. Worth a visit if you are downtown Mobile.

name: Trevor Hearing
text: Paul was awesome.  He allowed us to try a variety of beers until we found the perfect one.  I totally recommend this place!

name: Scott J
text: The food, the beer and the service was amazing.  This is a must visit anytime you are in Mobile.  We will definitely be back next time we travel through Mobile.

name: PAMELA HARVEY
text: Paul was super hospitable & accommodating.  He made sure we found a beer we liked.  He also had great suggestions for food.

name: Stephayne Marshall
text: Food was good. Cant say the same about the service. Rude rude rude. Didnt even wanna tip

name: matthew stephens
text: Dont go to the downtown store, unless you like being ignored. The one in west mobile has MUCH better service.

name: Bacon fernisaur
text: Great food and really good service!

name: John Frazier
text: Maybe the best burgers on this street but far from the best burgers. Meat is bland and has no seasoning. They do have some neat burger recipes. Maybe more beer would've swayed my opinion

name: Mobtown Man
text: Horrible service  I've never left a bad review before.,but lunch is my highlight of my day.monnday 5/13/19 the young man was inatentave and slow. Extra sauce cost extra  and it  wasn't in the box when we got back work. and using a card cost extra.

name: NANCY H
text: Great food and beer. The bartenders are really friendly

name: Jason Slater
text: Great atmosphere, excellent food & drink.

name: Mark Ivy
text: Fries were good,the burger was over cooked and bland. Although many different people came to the table,it wasn't busy and service wasn't great. They would ask you if you needed something and just not come back,had to ask the same person 4 times for one thing.

name: Kenneth Taylor
text: 2nd best burger in Mobile. Beer is always good and reasonably priced. Staff is always friendly as well. It can be a little crowded in the evenings so it's better to go a little early.

name: Angela Gavin
text: Awesome experience! Michelle was awesome! They were very patient with our demanding group! I as a server would cringe...lol.. at us coming in. What food and staff!! Will be back!!!

name: Lisa Hayes
text: Excellent food, funky punky atmosphere. Jukebox. Indoor and outdoor seating.

name: Paul Payne
text: Restaurant was severely understaffed. Took 45 minutes to get a beer and 2 hours to get food. I spoke to a server about the subpar service and my wife’s food (not only was my wife’s food poorly prepared, her and the rest of the table received their meal 15 minutes before me) she was defensive and said “well, that is what you ordered”. I spoke to the manager and she was apologetic but by the time my food arrived, not only was the burger cold and the side wrong, I was ready to leave, not eat. The story goes on but to keep it simple, I do not recommend this establishment and will not be frequenting it anytime soon.

name: Megan Ashford
text: Cameron was my server and was absolutely awesome!!!!

name: Rachel Forbes
text: Great burgers!

name: phillip zangas
text: Chicken and waffle burger....nuff said!.... oh and the beer selection!

name: John Kagey
text: Wow. Great beer selection and great food. Don't hesitate to go here.

name: Esstern Shore Garage Doors
text: Great atmosphere , good food and friendly waitress

name: Matt H
text: Great beer/drink selection and awesome food to complement it.

name: Esther Mason
text: Great service. Lots of beer choices. Great food. Restrooms need handyman maintenance.

name: Jon May
text: Good place to hangout and the food is good.

name: Sam R
text: always great service, friendly staff  delicious food, and of course a vast beer selection. a go-to for every trip downtown!

name: Venkata Rohith Reddy Matli
text: Wings were not too spicy but the appetizers and burgers were good. Wide range of beer and food items.

name: Barbara Folse
text: Went there before and after Robert plant concert......Awesome.... Pretty busy so service was kinda slow ...but I get it .. work in the. Industry...  Food and atmosphere amazing....will definitely go back!!!...need one in Pensacola!!! BTW.. Guacahummuss was to die for!!!! Loved it!!!

resp.text: Thanks Barbara Folse!  Please do come again, and so happy you enjoyed our fare.

name: Keith Hansen
text: Brendan was AMAZINGLY helpful. I actually looked forward to him coming to our table and telling us more about the beers. He was awesome.  AND you need to try the Mama's pretzel bites. Very good.

name: Thomas Moynihan
text:
Great food, expansive craft beer menu and rather solid service. Most servers are kind and helpful, but others seem to be rather dismissive regarding the beer menu.

I'd highly recommend descriptions beside beer types, such as whitbier or Lager for example, or even just regular updates with staff on the beer list if that isn't done.

All in all, this a staple in the Downtown Mobile area and lives up to the hype.

name: Bo Klug
text: Food was very good beer is a little pricey  but they have an amazing selection. I would definitely revisit!

name: Jill Street
text:
We were so excited about the West Mobile location to open as we have visited the downtown store and reallly liked it. My schnitzel was HUGE and the cabbage and potato salad were pretty authentic....we lived in Germany for 6 years and it satisfied our German food itch..However, the gravy appeared to be decoration, not enough for a schnitzel that size. I asked for more and was given about 2 tablespoons more. Oh well.
The following week we went back with friends and one of us ordered fish and chips. Again, a very generous portion and good taste but he was given one small pre-portioned disposable cup of tartar sauce....for 5 large pieces of fish. When he asked for more, they told him they had to charge him 50c for it.....for approx 2 tablespoons of tartar sauce. Of course, he wanted more but even that wasn’t enough.
We probably won’t go back. The food portions are generous but they are ridiculous about the accompanying sauces and that doesn’t sit well with me.
Y’all need to get it together.
By the way I saw a review by someone who ordered the schnitzel at the downtown location and it’s looked as if their meal came with a reasonable amount of mushroom gravy.

name: Taylor Allen
text: Had high hopes, looked like a great hole in the wall. Ordered pretzel bites as app, never arrived. Asked for my burger to be cooked medium rare, arrived well done and had that scorched, burnt hair flavor.. Probably from the weight I saw the cook place on top of it. Bacon was deep fried which was the worst part..I think if I came earlier in the day I might have gotten a better experience.

name: Lillian-Lotus Buccola
text:
Some of the best food in downtown Mobile. Small groups if people, do this. Only reason I docked a star is because when I had a group over 8 (22 of us in total across 3 tables) our largest table wasnt served for over an hour. Management was amazing in handling our issues and fixed this speedily. But me and a few others won't go back with any large groups again.
But if you have 8 people or smaller. Go here. And try anything involving the Sugar Rush doughnuts. Also some favorites are their wings, Mac Attack and Ruben.

name: Doyle Tranbarger
text: Crazy large beer selection and best flavored bleu burger I have ever had.

name: Hope Russo
text: This was a really fun place to visit. The menu is unique and everything we had was delicious!

name: Kinsey Potter
text: I always have an amazing time here! They have a full bar and amazing food! My friends and I always come here for a beer and a burger!

name: Art Gonzales
text: Amazing selection of beers. Make sure to try the Hippie Snacks. They were great. The bar tenders were friendly and attentive.

name: Miranda Scorver
text: Service was horrible! Staff (mainly the manager) was rude and condescending. It seemed like they were annoyed that our food came to the table wrong and we refused to take what we did not order. The waitress might have been new but she did not know the menu or the different burgers when they came from the kitchen. I was very disappointed because I had been there several times before. But I refuse to spend my money where they don't appreciate all their customers. At the end the manager tossed all of our tickets on the table in a small stack, mumbled "sorry" and then walked away. I understand mistakes happen but they were so unapologetic that it was infuriating. Will never be back...wish I could give them 0 stars.

resp.text: There's never an excuse for lousy service and we are disappointed to learn we obviously did not meet your expectations on  your recent visit. Please let us right this customer service wrong by allowing me to buy your next burger and a beer. Loda Beir Garten continues to be committed leaders in the downtown restaurant industry for our customer appreciation. We love all of our customers and want your experience to be satisfying and fun! Again, please accept our appology and let us make it right with you.

name: Ijkl Mnop
text: Very laid back. Food is good if you're too hungry or even just looking for a quick bite. Bear selection is great! We were in mobile for 2 days and every night we would sit around at Loda for almost 2,3 hours. Not to mention the hot waitresses (grrrrrrr)!

name: Katie Melissa Underwood
text: Best beer selection downtown area. All the workers are amazing and always upbeat. They have great happy hour specials and great food. You have to try the Schnitzel and their Bloody Mary is amazing!!

resp.text: Glad you had a great experience and enjoyed the Bloody Mary!  Please come again.

name: Crystal Colohan
text: Amazing food great service

name: Christian Rettig
text: Some of the best burgers in town, along with probably the best beer selection in town.

name: Portia “Jhazzyp” Wright
text: They have good burgers.  I tried the Buffalo budget last night and it was delicious.  I also love the spinach and artichoke chips and dip.

name: Justin Marvin
text: This place is amazing! Great staff! Great food! And GREAT beer!

name: Dalton Kelley
text: Good food. Good beer. If you are a fan of sours this is the place to go. I recommend the serpent bite. It's the best damn sour I have ever had. I ordered the bratwurst and was looking forward to the sauerkraut, but ended up being blown away by the red cabbage I ordered for the side.

name: Caroline Shook
text: Had one of the best waitress in the city. The food (burgers) are to die for! Very tasty, moist and fresh. Would definitely recommend for the service and burgers!

name: HouseCallPro Pro
text:
The food isn't spectacular but it isn't bad either and there are a few interesting novelty items.  The beers are many and fun to try.  However, the service is terrible.  Every time I have been (to the west Mobile location) the service has gotten worse and worse until the last time when it took twenty minutes of waiting and me finally having to get up and go get someone before we ever even were asked our drink order (and this when they were not barely 25% capacity).  The entire dining experience took two hours and involved our drink orders getting botched as well as the subsequent food order getting botched.

Servers seem to just stand around, walking past occasionally only to ignore you.  This isn't a one-server issue but a culture amongst the servers at this restaurant.  I don't expect we will be back.

name: Chevalier Stones
text: This was a great place to eat and drink but it's a very popular corner on Dauphin Street so it gets crowded quickly, especially when we were there during Mardi Gras. They have a huge selection of libations and very friendly staff. Worth a visit if you are downtown Mobile.

name: Tru
text:
Amazing food!! Burger on a doughnut or waffle! Reuben is great. A unique selection of options on the menu and more beer options than you could ever get through. Courteous staff are super friendly.
*beware you may want to sit inside.. we always sit outside with our dog but there are alot of bums that try to engage you while you eat. The staff is quick to run them off but still not cool.

name: Priya Karmakar
text: Good place for food and drink

name: Keith Coulter
text: Great food great service

name: Gordon L
text: Great burgers and beer selections.  Think I had the courthouse burger with buffalo blue cheese topping.  Delicious but am sure lost 2 years of life from eating it all.  Would go back.

name: Matt
text: Who knew Mobile had a Biergarten with this kind of selection? Incredible! So glad we stumbled upon this bar after our friends wedding. Bar staff was courteous and knowledgable. Wish we had appetites to try the food. Look forward to returning next time we're in town.

name: Alan Epley

text: My wife and I ordered the Bloody Mary which used to be phenomenal. I guess they decided that the mix needed barbecue sauce. It was the worst mix I’ve ever attempted to drink! We informed the bartender that we would like something else only to be told that we don’t have to drink it but yet we would still be charged! We were told it’s the law that a drink could not be sent back which is completely ludicrous. All we wanted was for the drink to be exchanged for something else but were told that was not possible. Unbelievable! Staff was completely rude to us because we refused to pay for something that was unacceptable. Do yourself a favor and avoid the Bloody Mary at all costs unless you really like a barbecue sauce infused one!

We ate here because it advertises 'veteran owned' but no military person moves this slow.

Finally ordered the pig on a stick, HORRIBLE, not sure how you screw up conechuh sausage but they were deep fried in batter and not drained of any of the grease.
My food was served with no utensils and more importantly napkins.
I hope they get it together but as for now, I wont be back anytime soon.

name: Gregory McDaniel
text:
This is a review of the new location in West Mobile, not down down.

Where to begin.. Well, I normally give an establishment 2-3 times before writing them off.. So, between the wife and I, we have been here at least 3 times. Several people in our group had been multiple times as well..

I'll start with the sever.. While she was definitely nice and friendly, she was just not good at serving people. EVERYTHING TOOK FOREVER .. Drink order (we had water), took 20 minutes.. Then another 10 minutes to get it. All in all, we were there 3 1/2 hours.. Not because we were lounging.. It literally took that long to get our drinks, appetizers and meals, etc.. It took so long , several (about 4-5 people) left our group (started with 12), before we had the cake for the "birthday"..

We sat with empty water glasses until another server saw it and stepped in to help.

The food: it was okay.. That is about the best I can give it. My wife was there a week before and had a burger and it was very dry.. Just plain out over cooked. Same thing happened the other night to everyone who had a burger. They all said the same thing; over cooked.. I even heard someone say, "Man, I even like my burgers cooked a little on the well done side, but this is something else"..

Another problem; When the food finally came out, it was lukewarm. I also saw a "chef" in the back remove the lid off of a small plastic container (looked like dressing) that a server brought to him. He smelled it, dipped his pinky finger in it and tasted. He then proceeded to put the lid on it and hand it back to the server while he was shaking his head in a yes gesture. She then walked out of the kitchen with it and brought it to a table.

I could go on and on.. But I won't. They may have good beer, but I don't drink.. So, there is that.. But if you like loud places, with mediocre food, this is your place..

P.S.... Now, several in our group said the one down town was better, but I wouldn't know.. I have never been down there to that one and I will not go. Especially after this experience.

text: This review is for the new west mobile locaton. I really thought when this place opened up they would work out the kinks.   This place has went in the wrong direction. Tonight, 8/4/2018 was a disaster.  2 hour wait is unacceptable along with our food never making it to the bar.  The burger that was ordered was eaten by the bartender after his shift, I was sitting next to him at the bar.  Staff, service needs a reboot already.  Really thought this was going to be a perfect fit for west mobile,  It hurts me to write this as I am a big supporter of the downtown location.  I may try it again in 6 months but as for now, back to mugshots.

text: Went somewhat late (10:30) on a week day. The recommended burger had a horribly off putting taste that I think was coming from the sauce or pineapples. The $10ish Bloody Mary was so salty and so strongly tasted of just horse radish that it was a waste and the fish and chips....well the chips were good. Definitely won't be rushing back anytime soon.

name: Erik Hartwig
text: For a German restaurant, they have terrible terrible German food.  There isn't a drop of vinegar (that could be detected) in either the red cabbage or the potato salad, and the schnitzel was under seasoned and boring.  Stick with the burger and fries, those are at least worth eating.

name: Kimberly Hart
text:
The Beer is good (because they dont make it) but the food is inedible. We thought they couldnt possibly screw up a pretzel. I speculate they make a giant vat of dough and use it for all their needs while it sits there getting remixed and reused. I also think they bake the pretzels partly then finish the cooking off when you order -adding a smattering of salt rocks and a brush of tasteless vegetable oil.

The "cheese" sauce is poorly named. I would call it more..."flavorless yellow flour paste".Flour and fat mixed together with salt. The cheese they so boldly claimed to be in the dip, clearly has the wisdom to avoid the company of such poor preparation, and has chosen to steer clear of association with this so called "cheese sauce". More power to you cheese! Fight the power!

Drink the beer here but dont eat the food. It looks amazing -don't be fooled. Its like a setup for a photoshoot where they use glue for milk-It looks pretty ... probably wont kill you....? But I shant risk it.

The service was also really slow but to be fair it was a busy night.

name: millerjustin0489
text: The beer was good the food was awesome but holy sh**, what came after can only be described as pure HELL. The night started off great had a nice beer from the awesome selection and decided to go with a deep fried burger, it sounded amazing and it tasted amazing just like the beer. So after eating was finished got another beer and some good scotch and decided after that to head home for the night. HOLY S*** 5  o'clock came a rocking and that's what came a knocking, I plastered the inside of my toilet bowl with rich hue of mahogany colored fecal matter, and for several hours had uncontrollable and uncomfortable gas. This morning can only be described as the birthing of the Anti Christ, and my poor girl not only had to suffer from my uncontrolled gas she to was blessed the same wonderful experience of explosive bowel movements. If it was for this I'd highly recommend this place, heck I'd give it 5 stars cuz it actually looks kinda like a beer garden and the food was truly good. #harbosurgarfreegummybears.

resp.text:
We are very sorry to hear about your experience the other night. If you truly feel you got food poisoning, I would recommend seeing your General Doctor so they can run tests to see if it was food poisoning or if it was the fatty food that your stomach was unable to handle. If you visit our establishment in the future, which we hope you do, please choose something less rich to make sure your stomach can tolerate it.
Thank you for the review and we appreciate the feedback.

text: Rediculous number of beers on tap and bottles. Sunday half priced taps and Tuesday half priced bottles. 102 beers on tap!!!!! Then there's the food!!! Bratwurst filled pretzel bites, Buffalo chicken Rangoon, the most interesting burgers you've ever, and I mean EVER, tasted!!! Absolutely a MUST if you ever visit Mobile, AL... And if you live here... What are you waiting for... An epicurian's delight!!!

name: Dylan Hendrix
text: The Biergarten is on the downward spiral of cutting corners to save on costs. They used to serve great food and beer, but now you're basically paying high/mid-range restaurant prices for diner food. Dude, they charge $5 for a bottle of Yeungling. Their food plays like it's all frozen fried. I've had some great meals here, but tonight was incredibly disappointing. I wasn't drunk enough to be fooled into thinking my food was acceptable.

text: Food is always great and they have a vast drink selection. This is starting to be our go to spot after concerts at soul kitchen or saenger

name: Jennifer Mcilwain
text: Get the RSA. Nothing is cooler than a fried egg and peanut butter on a burger. Just consider that it is a down town location and Friday and Saturday nights can be a bit crowded, but they do offer out door seating so that's a plus. Good staff good food, go get you that RSA burger.

Hands down my favorite spot to eat downtown.

name: Kanietrice Whitfield
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. I visited one Sunday afternoon, sat at the bar and ordered beer and food. Once my food arrived (ragoons, cheeseburger) looked great but...a small roach creeped around the bar towards my food. I used a napkin remove it, Yuck. Then minutes later another one was seen crawling around, again I used a napkin to dispose of it. I then called the waiter (caucasian woman with blue hair) told her the situation and she got very rude. I asked for the manager, who wasn't pleasant but approachable. The manager states she is aware of situation and that they have had (2) exterminators to come out and all the bars have them 🤮🤮 and all roaches are leaving now. GROSS, I was then given a 10% discount on my tab with to go boxes that I politely left at the bar.

text: 32 years old, and just got turned away a young female bartender, because my ID (valid until '18, 2 year old, class-E) didn't look like my girlfriends brand new-style MO ID. So if your state has issued new ID's since you've gotten yours, don't be surprised if you get shoo'ed away. Disappointed as hell, enjoy the review, no choice but to take my money elsewhere.

name: Charles Washington
text: Absolutely the worst dining experience of my entire life. If i could give it zero stars i would. Told it was a 20 min wait...turned out to be 1 hour. Sat at the table for 15 mins before anyone greeted us. Food and drinks took forever. Could not get a second round or a glass of water. I ordered the Sugar rush burger no onions and it had onions on it. My wife ordered a salad with grilled chicken. No salad came out...we had to ask for it and it came out incorrectly...no chicken. I was asked if the no onions had anything to do with a food allergy as if to imply why cant I just eat them. And the absolute topper...after sitting at the table for over 45 mins with empty glasses waiting on the food....NO SILVERWARE! By then we were over it and just asked for the ticket and 2 to go boxes which turned out to be the only time we got prompt service. And not to forget through all of that...the manager made a stop at the table and asked if we needed anything and I told him a water and he said he would get it himself...never showed up. Thanks. I'm never going back. Fyi....this all happened at the NEW LOCATION ON COTTAGE HILL ROAD!!!

text: The pretzels were terrible, the sauce not much better, the waitress wasn't very knowledgeable about your beers...which makes no since at all.  She did recommend a beer that was tasty and my enjoyed the cider beer, however, when our waitress came back to check on us...my friend ask for the same beer.  When the waitress came back with our beers she told my friend that you were out of the beer that SHE recommended in the first place.  She brought my husband the wrong beer.  And the truth is...the waitress looked like she had way to many beers herself the night before.  And finally, the bathroom was horrible!!!  One was out of order and the other would not flush!!  I am sure that if I had stood there long enough to giggle the handle it would have flushed...but who wants to work on a toilet when your at a restaurant!!!  Oh the restaurant looks very welcoming with it's charming tables outside and the huge selection of beers but if I were you, I would look for ambiance at better restaurant in Mobile and skip this experience in dining!

name: Crawfish King
text: Amazing Burger. I had the Sänger, which has this huge, delicious, fried porabella mushroom with bacon & a thick burger patty (which was a bit dry, so I used mayo) that will make you unhinge your jaws to take a bite. Their fries were pretty good, too. The pretzel was the best I ever had, b/c it's an authentic German pretzel & not those fake cardboard rings that go by the name "Rold Gold". Their butter dip is amazing, but limited, for it is super expensive to make.

name: J S
text: Great service, our waitresses were great friendly and accommodating. Both with great conversation and even better recommendations. We headed there on a whim after a long day of diving to find late night treats. Beer selection was amazing! A Brettanomyces fermented stout and a double pilsner! Oh and let's not forger the 🍔's! Juicy, delicious and memorable. I was thinking a great beer joint with mediocre bar food but I was slapped upside the head quickly. The Bienville was amazing! The sidewinder fries amazing! This is the spot while in Mobile so when I'm enroute from Houston I'll see you guys again. Thanks

name: Matt Jennissen
text: 4 of us in training here at Keesler Air Force Base were in Mobile for the day and thought this place seemed like a fun spot to hang out. It started out that way. Our wait staff was really fun and engaging (the bartenders, we were bellied up the whole time), the touchtunes were rockin' and everyone in the bar was having a fun time. We got there around 3:00 and at shift change, must have been around 8:00, the bartenders who replaced the ones we had before were cranky, unengaging and extremely slow to respond to any drink or food orders we made. All-in-all they were fairly rude, which is too bad, because the afternoon crew was absolutely great. Beer selection here is wonderful, but it would serve them well to have some friendlier people working behind the bar.

name: Riley Snyder
text: Order local food inside then enjoy plenty of outdoor seating with a bar on the back porch. Hosts occasional live music and other events.

name: Steven Akin
text:
I managed to get my little two-door sedan stuck in the mud tonight directly in front of Dority's.

I eventually went inside and asked the man working the counter (who I can only assume is one of the owners) if he had any 2x4's laying around that I could put beneath my tires. Remarkably, he did and showed me where to find them. That in and of itself was incredibly kind. This guy didn't owe me anything.

So I find the two 2x4's, carry them around to the front parking lot, and start working to get them under my tires. After about 20 more minutes of this I'm starting to get annoyed. Out of nowhere, this little kid (maybe 5 or 6) runs up and ask if I could use some help, cause his daddy's "got a big ole truck." Sure enough, his dad comes over, offers to pull me out, and goes to get said truck. In the meantime, 4 or 5 more kids materialize and start asking me questions rapid-fire. Do I need any water? What about a coke? How'd I get stuck? Am I hungry? (After crawling around in the mud, I admittedly probably looked homeless).

The guy pulls his truck around and starts asking. These. Kids. For advice. What do they think we should do? Where on my car should we hook the strap? What blew me away is they knew what they were talking about! They start making comments about axles and the frame of my car. He has them shine a light for me while I'm attaching the strap. He has them guide me back once I'm out of the mud. (Boy, did i feel like a yuppie.)

Come to find out, the guy who pulled me out was the owner's son-in-law and some of the kids were the owner's grandsons. (Backstory: the first kid saw me carrying the 2x4's away from the restaurant and thought I was stealing them 😂)

If it wasn't for the good folks @ Dority's, I'd still be stuck in the mud.

P. S. - the loaded wedges and shrimp basket are worth your time.

text: The food was phenomenal. Hot fresh and seasoned just right. Huntsville Red Lobster is the poster child for restaurant perfection. The staff is warm neat and friendly, with fast service. text: Our server was Michael. He went out of his way to get us a dinner that wasn't even on the menu anymore. The food was cooked to perfection. The restaurant was clean as always. Partitions were secured between booths and staff wore masks. We had a wonderful time!

text: My friend and I are lunch here. It was definitely fresh absolutely wonderful. Our waiter was amazing.  He made our dine in experience delightful.  Great food, atmosphere and terrific customer service.

text:
What can I say? Their food is great and the service was totally on point. Like, seriously, my drink was never empty.

As always, the cheddar biscuits were fabulous; hot and buttery.

The service was also extremely quick, even considering that we arrived 40 minutes before they closed. It was absolutely awesome.

text: The food is still very good after all these years.

name: Amber Brown
text: First time we ever went, and the service and food were fantastic! Initially, there was an hour to an hour and a half wait, which we understood being it is Mother’s Day, but they got us in within 30 minutes! Our waitress was Auburn, and she was incredibly sweet and helpful! My little sister loved her.. even went to hug her.

name: Ashleigh Mitchell
text: I can not even explain how good our food just was. I’m talking absolutely delicious. Every single thing was cooked perfectly and it all came out very quickly. We are regulars here but it seemed extra good today for some reason.

resp.text: Ashleigh, happy to hear you were well taken care of at our Huntsville Red Lobster Restaurant and we'll ensure this is passed along to our team! 😋  We hope to see you again soon for more of our classic seafood meals 🦞

text: It was mother's day food was good although my wife said the crab cakes were not as flavorful as she remembers. My fish and chips was wonderful and our server was on top of things. Being a Holliday and busy as mother's day can get over all was pleased 😀

resp.text: We’re glad you enjoyed every bite, VW! 🤤 😋 Thank you for visiting and giving our Huntsville Red Lobster restaurant, 5 stars. 🦞

name: East Nashville
text: Well to start, our server Arthur was fantastic! I never had to wait on a drink and he was polite and I could tell he knew what he was doing. He is the sole reason they even got 2 Stars. The food.....Oh the food. It was absolutely terrible. It was my wife's birthday and she really wanted to go here. It was my first time. I ordered some lobster tails she had the ultimate feast. When I got my food a $40 meal, my lobster was like a rubber band ball it was disgusting. I could barely rip it apart with my fingers. It could literally bounce. I had to cut it with a steak knife. I should have been fluffy, buttery and savory. I know it's not an ocean side restaurant but with a name like Red lobster I figured the lobster would be decent. I was so let down. Please make sure your cooks can at the most cook lobster. How is a place named Red Lobster serving such terribly cooked lobster. Your chef clearly doesn't belong at your store.  My in-laws ordered fish and chips. The fish had to have been dipped and breaded 15 times before it hit the fryer. When they finished they had almost an entire plate of batter that they picked and pealed off their fish. I was so embarrassed taking them here. My kids ordered the sirloin steak, they claimed to like it but they are kids, kids like anything. The steaks looked pretty beaten up and over cooked. Thank you Arthur for offering to replace the meal with a better cooked one,( "which I turned down" ) and thank you for being a fantastic server! I know that's a tough job. You were worth the $50 tip I left you. But Red Lobster I beg you to hire some efficient chefs and focus on training your cooks how to properly prepare lobster, steak and even a simple fish and chips. Find people who want to be there and who care weather their food is good. I'm not asking you to fire this person that cooked our food tonight but at the very least spend hours retraining them to cook your food the way it should be. I can't imagine how much money your company wastes throwing away food that was cooked terribly. I'm not sure I'll ever go to another Red lobster again which stinks because my wife raved about it, but it was just upsetting. I hope anyone who reads this doesn't have the same experience. I work too had for my $$$ to have someone not care how their food turns out. I don't blame red Lobster as I don't know their current situation but they have to know that their cook is not very good. Thank you for trying to make it right but first time is a charm. Thanks aka. EAST

resp.text: Our goal is to provide a 5-star seafood experience and we apologize for letting you down, East. If you’d like a follow up regarding your visit to our Huntsville Red Lobster restaurant, please send us a private message on Facebook. Please include the location you ordered from, details of your experience, and reference GM050421A. www.facebook.com/redlobster/ Thank you!

name: Joe Pierce
text: Great service, great atmosphere, great food! It's nice to be able to hear the person next to you for a change! :) Food was terrific and service was excellent. Highly recommend this Red Lobster to anyone craving seafood.

resp.text: Joe, glad you could stop in and that our Huntsville Red Lobster was worthy of your 5 star rating. Happy to hear you enjoy seafood as much as we do! 😍

name: Austin Bullard
text: To start, Service was decent. The food was another story. My lobster tail, which was about the size of a shrimp, was brought out brown. The Brussels sprouts smelled like a trash dump, and my steak was not good at all. This place has gone way downhill. Used to be decent but will not be returning.

resp.text: Austin - We appreciate the recommendation and we will forward your comments to our Huntsville Red Lobster team! text: Our meal was delicious! The staff was very friendly and helpful. The restaurant was neat and clean. Will definitely be back.

name: Google Mapper
text: What happened to that place? Red Lobster use to be a really nice place to eat. The steak and lobster meal was very disappointing. The small steak was overcooked and the dry lobster tail was smaller than a chicken finger! I was upset to discover that the service was much worse than the meal. My drink order was taken and I was provided bread. 20 minutes later, my drink arrives and I Insisted on placing my order. Dinner plate arrived 40 min afterward.  After eating my meal, I waited almost an hour before I could get someone to track down my server so I could pay and leave. If I had walked out without paying, it would have been hours before anyone noticed! NEVER AGAIN!! 👎

resp.text: We are sorry to hear the quality of food you received is not what you’d expect from our Red Lobster and we’d like to make your next visit a 5-star seafood experience. name: Stephen Judy
text: Went on a Saturday night just after the dinner rush. Friendly host seated us quickly.  Server was prompt and pleasant.  Ordered the spinach artichoke lobster dip and then placed our order. Appetizer showed up maybe 15 minutes later with our entrees about 30 seconds behind,  which is my biggest pet peeve.  Kitchen has no sense of timing a meal. The dip was great, meals were ok. Baked potatoes were undercooked.  My other side was left off and had to ask the server for it. All in all about what I expect from Red Lobster....good service, ok food, clueless kitchen.

name: Linder Metts
text:
May 27th - Our server was not wearing a mask. That order is still in effect until July 3rd. I was taken aback and perhaps this is on me for simply not getting up and walking out or bringing it up real time. This whole situation we all find ourselves in is awkward for all involved.  However, it is not on the customer's shoulders to enforce state rules. I just don't get it since it seemed most if not all of the other employees had appropriate facial covering.  Rationally I can tell myself that the exposure risk was probably low. On the other hand should I be having to go through that because a restaurant/employee couldn't be respectful of their customers?

Update 3 weeks later:  Although I never received anything other than a canned response on Yelp in spite of contacting them via their website, I made a visit last night in hopes of finding improvement and dinning. Well, incredulously, it was worse!  The State's mask orders are still in effect. Opening the door and entering this time even the host doesn't have a mask and the first server we see - no mask. We turned and walked out.  You have to ask yourself what kind of corporate/management approach so blatantly violates an obvious and easily implementable order. And if they have this disregard about the things you can see then what about those things you can't even during non-pandemic times.

This can be done correctly. I've witnessed it at many other both local and chain establishments. It boils down to commitment to customers or lack thereof.

resp.text: Hi, Linder Metts.  We’re so sorry to hear this and we hope you will give us another chance. Would you please fill out our online form and reference GM062320A in the comments section, so we can personally contact you and also know you first reached out to us here? We hope to hear from you soon! ms.spr.ly/ReviewSiteContactUsForm

text: Went at 11:45 Tuesday.  We both ordered the unlimited soup & salad.  Surprisingly, restaurant was not crowded.  I guess because it was cold & raining. My lobster bisque ( which I had to pay $3 extra) had NO lobster pieces.  Was totally liquid! I've had it before & it has always had a few little, tiny pieces of lobster in it.  So I was disappointed ☹️

name: Doug Johnson
text: Horrible service and horrible food. It all started when I asked for water, no lemon, and get brought back water with lemon. Not that big of a deal, it happens, simple mistake. I very foolishly paid for our food at the table tablet early as we were a bit short on time and wanted to leave as soon as we were done. Our food arrived and the steak was over done like shoe leather, the lobster tail was like eating a rubber band, and the side of fries was missing. The shrimp was at least alright. Our waitress was not seen again for 20+ minutes. She finally came back around, we mentioned some issues, and she vanished again. After several minutes, we caught some other waitress nearby and asked for a manager. After another 15+  minutes of no manager nor our waitress being seen, we left as we simply had no more time to waste dealing with this ordeal, we were already late at this point. We didn't get all the ordered food and half of what we did get wasn't even edible. It's bad when you leave Red Lobster and wish you would have stuck with Papa John's.

resp.text: Hi,Doug Johnson.  We're very troubled to hear this and we want to try and make this right. Would you please fill out our online form? When you submit your feedback, please  reference GM010320D in the comments section so that we know you first shared your experience here: ms.spr.ly/ReviewSiteContactUsForm. Thank you!

text: This Red Lobster is just average because they are not consistent with their food portions and service. When they are busy service can be lacking and the food portions are different on the weekends only. During the middle of the week or during slow times it's much better. My point of view or opinions come from over 7 visits but take out only, can't tell you how the experience is if you choose to dine in. The fresh catch salmon portion is rather small for $19 plus tax. Summary; If you know of a better seafood restaurant then I would try them instead.

name: Scott Allman
text: Another packed Red Lobster. I just moved back into town from Memphis. The Red Lobster there literally has the same qualities, defects, pros and cons as the one here in Huntsville, AL. Both lack in cleanliness. At peak hours the bathrooms become disgusting. Which seems understandable based on the amount of human traffic one establishment can take, but at the end of the day cleanliness has to come first above all. The food tastes like it came off an assembly line. I have no idea how people who’ve had real seafood, down on the Gulf of Mexico, can stand to come home from vacation and eat this? There’s nothing fresh about it. I have nothing negative to say regarding the staff. They seem like they work extremely hard. Sometimes it seems like they’re just holding on. Much respect. Verdict? If you want real, fresh and delicious seafood...get in you car and head South till you hit sand.

resp.text: Hi,Scott Allman. We're troubled to hear this and we'd like to learn more. Would you please fill out our online form letting us know more and reference GM051619A in the comments sections? ms.spr.ly/ReviewSiteContactUsForm. Thank you!

name: Jason Scrivner
text: Went on 5/22 and ordered curbside pickup. It took just shy of an hour, three phone calls that were each answered with indifference, and finally going inside to get our food. We were placated with a $10 gift certificate for the annoyance. I know we weren’t the only ones either as I saw a couple other cars waiting for just about as long as us only to end up having to go inside. What’s the point of advertising curbside service if you have no real intent of providing it? The whole point  was to avoid unnecessary contact, but we were essentially forced to go inside just to provoke any sort of response. This location has disappointed in the past, but never to the point of me feeling like posting a review; and like fools we keep coming back. This experience left us with a feeling that they just really don’t care, and that’s sad because we really like the product. That $10 gift card will probably end up in someone’s birthday card at some point because we’ll be hard pressed to go back any time soon.

resp.text: Hi, Jason.  We're very troubled to hear this and we want to try and make this right. Would you please fill out our online form? name: Kimberly Midkiff
text: The food was awful.  Food did not look photos Advertised. Calamari was so thick and too chewy.  Asparagus was not cooked.   Too hard too eat.  Service and waiter was amazing.  Pina colada s were the best thing about the meal.

resp.text: Hi Kimberly Midkiff, we’re sorry to learn about your disappointing experience at our Huntsville restaurant. We'd like to personally follow up with you to find out how we can improve. name: Ed Minett
text: The service was pretty good. The main course was served before we had two bites in our salads. We requested to be served the salads first. The steak was unevenly cooked.

name: ANDREW PORTER
text: The manager is the kindest person I ever met in the restaurant industry she is truly a good person, hard to find these days!

resp.text: Happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us, at our Huntsville Red Lobster!

name: James Truffa
text: Good place to eat

resp.text: You could've chosen any seafood restaurant and you chose us, James! 😍 Thanks for the 5 star rating and we're glad you enjoyed your experience. We can’t wait to see you soon for dinner or #RedLobsterToGo 🦞

name: Craig Whisenant
text: Our server, Veric, did a great job and was very kind.  He was the only thing positive about this visit and was very apologetic and embarrassed.  Cold food after waiting an hour and ten minutes for it to come out and we never heard from or saw a manager. I hope our Red Lobster isn't on its way out. 🙁

name: Battle Kitten
text: I Went in for lunch today at 1:00. I sat at the bar since I was alone and you usually get faster service at the bar. No one was there. No employees and only two ladies who were finished eating and sitting to talk. I waited two waiters bused tables around the bar. Finally a black guy came to the bar and answered his phone he talked and never acknowledged me. Employees milled around. A black girl came to chit chat with the hostess. Still no service. Black guy is still on the phone. Finally I left. Walking past the black girl and hostess no one said good bye thanks for coming. Not one person spoke to me.

resp.text: We're sorry you were unsatisfied with your experience, Battle Kitten. Would you please fill out our online form and reference GM110218C in the comments section along with your feedback? We would like a chance to make this right.  ms.spr.ly/ReviewSiteContactUsForm

name: Milan Whit
text: Best seafood around!

name: Stephen Ross
text: Went there for New Year's, was the first time in 20 years.  It was pretty good.  Most of the seafood restaurants in Huntsville aren't very good.  The quantity was good.  The wait staff was good.  I had no complaints.

text: Food was delicious for our party of 8, but we got our food later than we expected. Our server was great and kept our cups full the entire time we were there. For dinner you're looking at spending $25-$40 per person. Bigger parties should look into getting a reservation, especially on weekends.

resp.text: Thank you for giving the Huntsville Red Lobster 4 stars, Joshua Marc Howell, we look forward to giving you a 5 star experience next time.

text: Service was fantastic. Great friendly waitress that did a good job keeping an eye on tables while also training a new worker.

resp.text: Happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us, at our Huntsville Red Lobster!

text: Went to the one in Huntsville, Al and the only thing was good was the salad out of everything i ordered. Will not be going back no time soon.

resp.text: Hi,Vonette Moe. We're troubled to hear this. Would you please click the following link to fill out our form to tell us more about your experience? So we know the feedback is from you, please reference GM022520D in the comments section: ms.spr.ly/ReviewSiteContactUsForm. Thank you!

name: Dhruvil Patel
text: This is the worst place to eat at. Waiting time after ordering food was 45 minutes without anybody else being in the building. Waiter came out only once after taking order. When I ordered dessert they only came out with cake without ice cream and when I asked them where is my ice cream, they said that it’s after hours and they have already cleaned the stuff for it (scoop). They wanted to charge me for the whole dessert. When I asked for manager it took him about 15 minutes no exaggeration to come out. I will never eat at this place ever again. Also, it’s bad that when you enter the restaurant lobster’s in the tank greets you, but their is nobody at the front to greet you or anything. And the hostess asked us how long have we been waiting for.

resp.text: Hi Dhruvil Patel, we’re sorry to learn about your disappointing experience at our Huntsville restaurant and we’d like to know more. Please fill out our online form letting us know more about your experience and reference GM052119A in the comments section. text: Service was good but food was not. Lobster tail was overcooked and scampi was saturated in oil/butter, aftertaste. Shrimp overcooked. Bread and water were good lol

resp.text: Hi, Maria Moon. We're sorry you were unsatisfied with your meal at our Huntsville restaurant and we'd like to learn how we can make this better.
